humanum_full_description_en:
From " soil ", from " stay " to province, the original meaning is one of the ways to stop people. The ancients sat on the ground, and later generations sat on chairs and stools. "Shuowen": "Stop it. From the soil to stay in the province. The soil, the stop is also, this and stay agree." "Zuo Zhuan‚Äß Zhaogong 27th Year": "The shameful person sits and enters, the person who holds beryllium Hold it." Du's pre-note: "Sit and walk, knees and walk." "Book of Rites-Song Lishang": "Mr. Book Strategies, Qin Se is in front, sit and move, and refrain from overstepping." Kong Yingdashu: "Sitting is also kneeling. "The Biography of Gao Shi‚Äß Guan Ning" by Jin Huangfu Mi: "Guan Ning often sits on a wooden couch and has accumulated more than 50 years since he traveled across the sea and returned home.

" Sit " can mean stay behind. "Zuo Zhuan‚ÄßHuan Gong Twelve Years": "Chu people sit at its north gate and cover the mountains." Du pre-note: "Sit, still guard." This is also the meaning of the Jian silk text, "Mawangdui. Line 229 of the Book of Strategists in the Warring States Period: "Qin used the way of sitting on the intestines of the sheep with a strong crossbow, and then went to the ground, and he took the shao (Zhao) as a great enemy."

" Sit " can also mean residence. "The Biography of Huang Xiaozi": "Father and son sitting on the journey, trance for many days, because they stayed for years."

" Sit " can also mean a crime, as in "Yanzi Chunqiu‚Äß Neipian Zaxia": "Wang said: "Where to sit?" said: "Sit and steal."" Or it means to sit continuously, such as "Han Feizi‚Äß Ba Shuo": " To understand the way of the monarch, low virtue and righteousness, the next must sit, determined to participate, there is no way to listen, so the wise man must not deceive. You must sit down; if the report is not true, you must sit back."

" Sit " can also be used as " seat " to indicate a seat. Song Sima Guang "come poems immediately after returning home on the evening of February 30th": "The gate is full of gold, and I sit down and fly."

The ancients knelt on their knees and leaned their buttocks on their heels. This is the original meaning. Later, it generally refers to resting on the buttocks: sitting on the ground. Sit back. cushion. Ischium. Sitting (Buddhism refers to the monk sitting cross-legged to die). Sitting meditation. Sit work. Mount.
Take, take: take a car. By boat.
Persevere, extended to be permanent, not moving: "Chu people sit at its north gate and cover the mountains". Zuozhuang.
The location of the building or its back to a certain direction: located. Sit north and face south.
Put pots, pots, etc. on the fire: sit in the pot.
The object exerts pressure backwards: sit back on the roof.
The preposition, because, because, for: "Parking and sitting in the maple forest night, the frosty leaves are red in the February flowers".
Adverbs (a. Empty, in vain, such as "Hu is suffering from suffering, swallowing grief and still caress"; b. For no reason, naturally, such as "If this is the case, the salt will sit ten times longer"; c. Then, soon, such as "Hanying sits and sells, so why can we comfort the faraway visitors"; d. Deep, such as "sentimental to my concubine, and sad for her old beauty"; e. Positive, exactly, such as "Xicun ferry is late, and I can see the fishing boats returning home. ).
Conviction: even sitting. Sit back. Concealed (guilty of corruption).
Fruits and other plants are fruitful: sitting melon. Fruit set.
